item.title: Useful hints for Endnote

Endnote is the citation manager proclaimed in many courses at the INS. Over the past years Iâ€™ve encountered a number of struggles personally or through my peers. This document lists the major problems Iâ€™ve seen and offers solutions that worked for me.
